message: A post on a friend's message board claims that Signal Messenger use is being blocked within Egypt.  I can find no (English language) reports of this in the news.   Is this the experience within Egypt?

data.message: Even though I don't have many friends using it but it works fine on my side
Currently a lot of ISPs are blocking services like Skype, VOIP inside games, Facebook messenger. It's inconsistent

As per this post (in Arabic) there is no clear understanding of what's happening, it works sometimes and gets blocked others as per ISP and timing; but what's confirmed is that the website is blocked whispersystems.org by local DNS servers
https://www.facebook.com/amr.gharbeia/posts/10157883021120150?pnref=story
I experienced this my self, it fails to deliver messages most of the time with a "Failed to send" error, a friend told me the same, but surprisingly it delivers some old messages with few days delay.
Yes its blocked on some if the ISP in Egypt , confirmed from many friends who are using it daily. and its not working at my side i'm using vodafone usb modem and the website too is blocked.
